<h3 id="X10175">X(10175)&nbsp;=&nbsp;CENTER OF THE CENTROIDAL CONIC OF THE FUHRMANN TRIANGLE</h3>
Barycentrics &nbsp;&nbsp; (b+c)*a^3-(3*b^2+2*b*c+3*c^2)*a^2-(b^2-c^2)*(b-c)*a+3*(b^2-c^2)^2  :  :  <p><b>
X(10175) = 2*X(5)+X(10)
</b></p>
<p>X(10175) lies on these lines:{1,3090}, {2,515}, {3,3634}, {4,165}, {5,10}, {8,5056}, {9,6843}, {11,5919}, {12,354}, {30,10164}, {35,6920}, {36,6946}, {40,3091}, {46,6984}, {63,6993}, {65,3614}, {84,4208}, {116,119}, {117,374}, {121,5511}, {140,4297}, {145,9624}, {226,1737}, {355,1125}, {381,516}, {405,6796}, {442,5927}, {443,6256}, {474,5450}, {495,5049}, {498,950}, {499,6983}, {519,5055}, {546,3579}, {547,551}, {631,5691}, {726,7697}, {912,5883}, {936,6855}, {942,3947}, {944,3624}, {958,6918}, {962,5068}, {993,6911}, {997,6859}, {1012,4413}, {1056,5726}, {1064,5400}, {1158,5177}, {1376,6913}, {1385,3628}, {1478,3911}, {1479,6898}, {1482,3626}, {1512,5316}, {1532,3925}, {1699,3545}, {1735,7069}, {1770,5445}, {1788,9612}, {1891,7537}, {2077,6912}, {2095,5220}, {2476,7705}, {2550,6939}, {2551,5705}, {2800,3753}, {3057,7173}, {3085,9581}, {3086,9578}, {3219,5535}, {3244,5901}, {3333,5261}, {3339,5714}, {3359,6982}, {3419,6745}, {3421,5231}, {3525,7987}, {3544,7991}, {3577,5328}, {3583,6965}, {3585,5131}, {3586,5218}, {3616,5881}, {3617,7982}, {3656,4745}, {3679,5071}, {3681,6734}, {3754,5887}, {3812,5777}, {3826,6907}, {3829,3880}, {3839,9778}, {3841,6842}, {3844,5480}, {3850,5493}, {3855,6361}, {4084,5694}, {4298,9654}, {4304,5432}, {4311,5433}, {4342,7743}, {4669,5844}, {4678,5734}, {5794,6700}, {6001,10157}, {7288,9613}, {7671,7679}</p>
<p>
X(10175) = midpoint of X(i),X(j) for these {i,j}: {2,5587}, {4,165}, {10,3817}, {40,9812}, {1699,5657}, {3679,5603}, {5790,5886}<br>
X(10175) = reflection of X(i) in X(j) for these (i,j): (2,10172), (165,6684), (946,3817), (3817,5), (5886,10171) <br>
X(10175) = complement of X(3576)<br>
X(10175) = X(2)-of-4th-Euler-triangle<br>
X(10175) = centroid of X(3)X(4)X(10)<br>
X(10175) = {X(i),X(j)}-harmonic conjugate of X(k) for these (i,j,k): (4,1698,6684), (5,10,946), (5,3820,7680), (8,5056,8227), (10,3814,3452), (10,4301,5690), (119,6881,3822), (355,1125,5882), (355,1656,1125), (944,5067,3624), (1698,7989,4), (1737,7951,226), (2886,5123,10), (3090,5818,1), (3091,9780,40), (3545,5657,1699), (3679,7988,5603), (3812,5777,5884), (5055,5790,5886), (5055,5886,10171), (5071,5603,7988), (5261,5704,3333), (5587,10172,10165), (7680,7682,946)<br>
</p>
